miesmuschel 0.0.0-9000

Short Access Forms for Operators

Source: R/dictionaries.R
mut.Rd

These functions complement dict_mutators, dict_recombinators, dict_selectors with functions in the spirit of mlr3::mlr_sugar.

mut(.key, ...)

muts(.keys, ...)

rec(.key, ...)

recs(.key, ...)

sel(.key, ...)

sels(.key, ...)

ftr(.key, ...)

ftrs(.key, ...)

Arguments

.key

(character(1))
Key passed to the respective dictionary to retrieve the object.
...

(named list())
Named arguments passed to the constructor, to be set as parameters in the paradox::ParamSet, or to be set as public field. See mlr3misc::dictionary_sugar_get() for more details.
.keys

(character())
Keys passed to the respective dictionary to retrieve multiple objects.

Value

  • Mutator for mut()

  • list of Mutator for muts()

  • Recombinator for rec().

  • list of Recombinator for recs().

  • Selector for sel().

  • list of Selector for sels().

Examples

mut("gauss", sdev = 0.5)

#> <MutatorGauss>
#>   Inherits from: <MutatorNumeric>
#>   Public:
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     endomorphism: active binding
#>     initialize: function () 
#>     is_primed: active binding
#>     operate: function (values, ...) 
#>     param_classes: active binding
#>     param_set: active binding
#>     prime: function (param_set) 
#>     primed_ps: active binding
#>   Private:
#>     .endomorphism: TRUE
#>     .integer_native: FALSE
#>     .mutate: function (values) 
#>     .mutate_numeric: function (values, lowers, uppers) 
#>     .operate: function (values) 
#>     .param_classes: ParamInt ParamDbl
#>     .param_set: ParamSet, R6
#>     .param_set_id: NULL
#>     .param_set_source: NULL
#>     .primed_ps: NULL
#>     deep_clone: function (name, value) 
rec("xounif")

#> <RecombinatorCrossoverUniform>
#>   Inherits from: <Recombinator>
#>   Public:
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     endomorphism: active binding
#>     initialize: function (keep_complement = TRUE) 
#>     is_primed: active binding
#>     n_indivs_in: active binding
#>     n_indivs_out: active binding
#>     operate: function (values, ...) 
#>     param_classes: active binding
#>     param_set: active binding
#>     prime: function (param_set) 
#>     primed_ps: active binding
#>   Private:
#>     .endomorphism: TRUE
#>     .n_indivs_in: 2
#>     .n_indivs_out: 2
#>     .operate: function (values) 
#>     .param_classes: ParamLgl ParamInt ParamDbl ParamFct
#>     .param_set: ParamSet, R6
#>     .param_set_id: NULL
#>     .param_set_source: NULL
#>     .primed_ps: NULL
#>     .recombine: function (values) 
#>     deep_clone: function (name, value) 
sel("random")

#> <SelectorRandom>
#>   Inherits from: <Selector>
#>   Public:
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     endomorphism: active binding
#>     initialize: function () 
#>     is_primed: active binding
#>     operate: function (values, ...) 
#>     param_classes: active binding
#>     param_set: active binding
#>     prime: function (param_set) 
#>     primed_ps: active binding
#>     supported: active binding
#>   Private:
#>     .endomorphism: FALSE
#>     .operate: function (values, fitnesses, n_select) 
#>     .param_classes: ParamLgl ParamInt ParamDbl ParamFct
#>     .param_set: ParamSet, R6
#>     .param_set_id: NULL
#>     .param_set_source: NULL
#>     .primed_ps: NULL
#>     .select: function (values, fitnesses, n_select) 
#>     .supported: single-crit multi-crit
#>     deep_clone: function (name, value)
